pages.text: Leven is a water boss with rapid, AOE melee attacks. From a distance, he will fire small water bolts that can create puddles on the hit target. His melee attack consists of slow punches and launching waves of short-range tridents. Leven drops a Wave Crystal upon death. You can find the items needed to summon him on the next page.
Water Gem, Kelp, Pufferfish, Water Essence
